TEXT.TITLE: U.S. HEALTHCARE <USHC.O> TO BUY BACK SHARES
TEXT.BODY: U.S. Healthcare Inc said it has authorized the repurchase of up to 10 mln shares of stock. The company repurchased five mln shares under a program that ended earlier this year. Reuter
